name: SteamCleaner.NET
short_description:
When installing games from Steam on Windows the setups leave behind many files that are not needed any longer and consume disk space. These include .NET and Visual C++ runtimes, XNA framework, and DirextX files. Many of these files are very old versions that have no purpose and only one of many is actually used.

This software detects them based on their hashes and deletes the files outright clearing up disk space.
summary: Cleans up leftover setups when installing games with Steam.
